title: Hampton Inn Gaffney Offers Close Lodging for Limestone College Homecoming
text:
The Hampton Inn Gaffney SC offers close lodging for fans attending Limestone College 2015 Homecoming on October 10.
 GAFFNEY, NC, September 30, The Hampton Inn Gaffney SC hotel offers close lodging for alumni and fans attending the Limestone College 2015 Homecoming on October 10. The day begins with alumni games in the morning, followed by the Big Blue Tailgate featuring barbecue and live music. Limestone will take on Catawba College in the Homecoming Game. Kickoff time will be 7pm. Game tickets are $13 for reserved seats and $12 for general admission seating.
"We are happy to welcome back many alumni and fans attending Homecoming festivities at Limestone College," shares Anil Modi, General Manager at the Hampton Inn Gaffney. "Our hotel is close to shopping, dining, and the Limestone campus," continues Modi.
This award winning Hampton Inn is a top choice among hotels in Gaffney SC . Well appointed guest rooms feature free high speed Internet, flat screen TVs, and comfortable Hampton Clean and Fresh Beds . Hotel amenities include a 24-hour business center, coin laundry, and outdoor pool and patio. The Hampton On the House Breakfast, with healthy hot and cold options, is complimentary. On the Run Breakfast Bags are a quick alternative on weekday mornings. The Hampton Inn Gaffney received a 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award for outstanding service.
Guests attending Homecoming should ask for the special Limestone College rate. AAA and senior discounts are available. HHonors members will earn points toward free hotel nights. The Hampton Inn Gaffney is located off I-85 at Exit 90, adjacent to the Gaffney Premium Outlets featuring 75 popular stores.
For more information and tickets for the Limestone College Homecoming game, visit www.golimestonesaints.com . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn Gaffney South Carolina hotel , call 864-206-0011 or visit online at www.HAMPTONINNGAFFNEY.com .
About Hampton Inn Gaffney
The Hampton Inn Gaffney Hotel offers a welcome place to rest when you're on the road. Business travelers and vacationers alike will be delighted by the modern conveniences and outstanding service this Gaffney hotel includes. If you've ever wanted to experience true Southern hospitality, you're sure to find it here. The Hampton Inn Gaffney hotel is conveniently located off I-85 next to Hamrick's Department Store and Gaffney Premium Outlets. This property offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.
